lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry knocked down yet another 3-pointer in the waning moments, pulled his jersey up into his mouth and yelled to the rafters in triumph once more.

headline.print_headline: Curry and Record-Setting Warriors Headed Back to NBA Finals
headline.main: Curry and Record-Setting Warriors Headed Back to NBA Finals
